Name: Storm Chasers: Tornado Islands
About the game: One of the coolest Match3 games! Join Alex, her friend Professor Finch, and her faithful dog Muffin as they soar away from London in their airship – and right into the heart of a powerful tornado! The storm sends them into another dimension, where they crash-land in a most unusual new world. You’ll help them explore, meet the inhabitants, help them rebuild their village, and repair their airship so they can return home safely. Along the way, you’ll meet the inhabitants of the cloud village and see other unusual creatures. - More than 80 unique match-3 levels - Enjoy match-3, hidden object and mahjong! - Help the villagers rebuild their cloud village - Gorgeous Full HD graphics
